Journal of Official Statistics Special Issue on Time Series Analysis is just out and available [here](https://journals.sagepub.com/toc/JOF/current)

Two papers are related to JDemetra+ algorithms

- [Seasonal adjustment of infra-monthly time series with JDemetra+](https://doi.org/10.1177/0282423X241277602) by Karsten Webel (BBk) and Anna Smyk (Insee)

- [Improving Real-Time Trend Estimates Using Local Parametrization of Polynomial Regression Filters](https://journals.sagepub.com/doi/full/10.1177/0282423X241283207) by Alain quartier-La-Tente (Insee)
